src_text: Zegezi .
tgt_text: Merero ya ga Jaanong.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyitjhejile indima eyenziwako ekuphumeleliseni iHlelo lamaGadango weGezi, ithi itjhejile njalo ibe ivuma nokuthi kusese kunengi okuliya ukusebenza kwethungelelwano legezi lelizwe loke.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

Kabinete nopotse kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la Naga la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato bile a dumelana gore go santse go le gontsi go go santseng go tlhoka go diriwa mo go baakanyeng diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka fa nageng..

src_text: Njengoba kungena ubusika nje, iKhabinethi ithokozele ukuqedelelwa kweGontraga yokungezelela amandla wegezi ngama-400 wama-megawatts (ama-MW) ngehlelo i-Standard Offer Programme elizokuthoma ukusebenza ngaphambi kokuphela kukaMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Jaaka naga tsena mo marigeng, Kabinete itumedisitswe ke konteraka e sa tswang go garelwa ya dimekawate di le 400 ya go oketsa motlakase ka Letsholo la go Reka Motlakase mo Ditlamong tse di Nang le Motlakase Montsi go Feta di Dirisang mme motlakase ono tla gokelelwa mo diyuniting tsa rona tsa motlakase pele kgwedi ya Motsheganong 2023 konosela..

Mo godimo ga seno, Lefapha la Boitekanelo le nopotse maokelo le 213 a sa tshwanelwang ke go kgorelediwa ke go tshabela ruri ga motlakase, mo go ona le 76 ke ao ntseng sa itemogele matsapa ano mme tiro ya go oketsa palo eno ka maokelo mangwe gape le 46 gatetse pele mo go bonagalang..

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, umNyango wezePilo ukhombe iimbhedlela ezima-213 ekungasafanelanga ziqinteliswe igezi; kileziimbhedlela, ezima-76 zazo vele azisaqinteliselwa igezi, kanti-ke kusasetjenzelwa ukungezelela ezinye ezima-46 ngokukhamba kwesikhathi.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke thankgololo e solofetsweng ya Lefelo la Ditirelo tse Dintsi tsa Merero ya Motlakase ka la bo 31 Motsheganong 2023 le le tla thankgololwang ke ba Dipeeletso tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng selo se se tla potlakisang dithulaganyo tsa go ikobela melao go tswela thuso ditlamo tse dintšhwa tsa motlakase gore le tsona di kgone go thusa nopotse kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe kwa Seteišeneng sa Motlakase sa Kusile go busetsa tirisong dimekawate di le 3 200 tsa yuniti ya bo 1, 2, 3 le 5 tsa motlakase mo bokhutlhong jwa ngwaga wa..

Kabinete santse tlhobaediwa ke dikgang tsa maaka tse di tswelelang go phasaladiwa mo mafaratlhatlheng ditlhaeletsano tse di reng naga tlo welwa ke lefifi la go tlhoka motlakase ka ntlha ya go phutlhama ga diyuniti tsotlhe tsa tlamelo ya motlakase.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nokuvulwa okuseduze kwesiTolo seGezi esiPhethe Koke ngomhla wama-31 kuMrhayili esizokuvulwa yi-Invest SA kobanyana kuzokhanjiswa msinyana amahlelo wokulawula azokusiza iinkhampani eziphehla igezi ezitja ezizako.
tgt_text: Eskom netefaleditse puso gore na le maano go tlhokomela diyuniti tseno go dira gore naga se iphitlhele mo seemong sa go welwa ke lefifi.
Kabinete santse boeletsa boikuelo jwa yona jwa gore batho botlhe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa ba tshwanetse go boloka motlakase.

src_text: Itjheje godu nendima eyenziwako ePhawa iKusile yokubuyisela igezi ezii-3 200 MW, ngamaziko 1, 2, 3 ne-5 ethungelelwaneni legezi lelizwe, nakuphela umnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo ke go boloka motlakase yo kanaka dimekawate di le 1 000 ka letsatsi, mme seno se tla kgona go fokotsa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri ka kgato le nngwe letsatsi le letsatsi.

Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, mo kopanong le bobegakgang ka Labotlhano wa la bo 26 Motsheganong 2023 tla baya naga mo dinakong ka dikgato tse di tserweng mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato.

src_text: IKhabinethi iphatheke kumbi ngeendaba ezimamanga esele ziphikelele, eenkundleni zeendaba ezithi batjho kuseduze ukuthi ithungelelwano legezi lifadalale kuphele ngalo bese sisala emnyameni.
tgt_text: Boitekanelo.

src_text: U-Eskom uqinisekise urhulumende ngamahlelo akhona ekuzakukhandelwa ngawo ukuthi kungafiki lapho igezi iphela khona yoke sisale emnyameni ilizwe loke.
tgt_text: Go tloga ka la bo 24 Motsheganong 2023 Puso tlhomile Komiti ya Merero ya Setegeniki e eteletsweng pele ke Lefapha la Boitekanelo la Naga, go samagana le bolwetse jwa Kholera jo bo weleng kwa Hammanskraal mo masepaleng wa Teropo ya Tshwane, jo ga jaana bo setseng bo fetile ka matshelo le..

Go samaganwe le namane tona ya tiro ya go batlisisa gore bolwetse jono bo runtse kae ka tswa le mo metsweding ya metsi, diteroko tse di isetsang baagi metsi, mo dipompong le mo Seteišeneng sa go Tlhatswa Metsi a Leswe sa Rooiwal (WWTW).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuyelela isibawo ebantwini boke beSewula Afrika ukuthi baragele phambili ngokunconcosela igezi.
tgt_text: Go fitlha mo motsing ono, ga go bopaki bope jo bo bontshang fa go na le kokwana ya kholera mo metsweding yotlhe eno, mme seno se re raya se re go wa ga bolwetse jono ke ka ntlha ya tiragalo le nngwe e diragetseng ga jaana fetileng mme balwetse ba bangwe ba ba tlhagelelang ga jaana ke ka ntlha ya fa ba tshwaetsana.

src_text: Umnqopho kukuthi kulondwe i-1 000 MW yegezi qobe lilanga; lokhu-ke kulingana nokulonda igezi elingana nehlandla linye lokuqinteliswa kwegezi ilanga nelanga.
tgt_text: Jaaka go tsweletswe ka ditharabololo, baagi ba motse wa Hammanskraal ba rotloediwa gore ba bedise metsi a tswang mo dipompong mme ba topetse letswatswana pele ba ka nwa.
Se sengwe gape, fa motho berekwa ke mala feroga dibete kgotsa na le matshwao motho yo tshwerweng ke mala motho yoo lebe kokelong kgotsa kwa tleliniking ya kwa motseng yo leng mo go ona.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezeGezi uDorh.
tgt_text: Tona ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe, Rre Senzo Mchunu tla ikopanya le Meyara wa Masepala wa Teropo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labotlhano 26 Motsheganong 2023 maitlhomo le go loga leano mmogo la go samagana le go aga sešwa Rooiwal WWTW..

src_text: Kgosientsho Ramokgopa uzokubikela ilizwe emhlanganweni wembikiindaba ngokuphunyeleliswa kweHlelo lamaGadango weGezi ngeLesihlanu nakama-26 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Go bona tshedimosetsoka botlalo ka letsetsa mogala wa tshoganyetso o dirang bosigo le motshegare wa Setheo sa Naga sa Malwetse a Fetelanang (NICD) mo go 082 883.
Maele go okobatsa bolwetse jwa kholera teng mo go www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: Zepilo
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS).
Kabinete tiisiwa mmoko ke seo pegelo ya 2023 ya QLFS se tlhagisang mo palo ya batho ba ba thapiwang tlhatlogileng garataro mo dikotareng ka go latelana mme palo ya batho ba ba nang le ditiro ba le.

src_text: Urhulumende usungule ikomidi yomsebenzi ethwelwe mNyango wezePilo weliZweloke, ezakuqalana nokwehla kwesifo sekholera e-Hammanskraal esiphandeni se-Tshwane, ekuthe kufika umhla wama-24 kuMrhayili wee-2023 sabe sesithethe abantu abali-.
tgt_text: 2 milione atumelang mo go ba le.
4 milione leng palo re neng re le mo go yona pele ga COVID-.

src_text: Sikhuluma nje mkhulu umsebenzi owenziwako wokuhlola yoke imithombo engahle ibe kulapho kucabheleke khona, kungaba kusemithonjeni yamanzi ngokwayo, kungaba sematankeni adiliva amanzi, kungaba seempompeni namkha ebuTsengelweni baManzi i-Rooivaal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).
tgt_text: Seno ke se supo se se tlhamaletseng sa gore ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa boela sekeng..

src_text: Bekube nje, akunabufakazi bomulwana wekholera esele butholakele kilemithombo; lokhu-ke kungatjho khona ukuthi mhlambe ukwehla kwesifesi kusukele esehlakalweni sinye sokusilaphazeka, abantu base bayathelelana ukusukela lapho bekufike kilobubujamo banje.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsa batho ba ba thapilweng mo kgweditharong ya ntlha di bontsha gore go tlhodiwle ditiro di le 209 000 mo ditirong tsa semmuno mmogo le tse dingwe di le 107 000 mo ditirong tseo seng tsa semmuso mo kgweditharong ya ntlha ya monongwaga.
Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Amerika.

src_text: Njengoba kuthathwa lamagadango nje, izakhamuzi ze-Hammanskraal zikhuthazwa ukuthi ziwabilise amanzi wazo wepompo bese ziwanunga ngetsherwana yetshwayi ngaphambi kobana ziwasele.
tgt_text: Kabinete totobatsa kgang ya gore botsalano jwa naga ya Aforika Borwa le jwa Amerika santse le jwa go ntshana se se mo inong, jo bo sa nonofileng bile bo tswela maphata otlhe mosola ka go lekana mme seno se latela gore Tona ya Dikamano le Tirisano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhaba, Ngaka Naledi Pandor rwale maoto go kopana le Moambasatara wa naga ya Amerika, Reuben Brigety, go tšhotlha kgang ya gagwe ka go latofatsa naga ya Aforika Borwa gore rekiseditse naga ya Russia dibetsa.

src_text: Ngaphezu kwalokho, umuntu ogijinyiswa yindeni, osililekako namkha onamatshayo wokuthi kunento engakalungi ngendeni akarhabele kudorhodere namkha etlinigi yangekhabo.
tgt_text: Kabinete boeletsa mafoko yona gore go na le dikgato tse di tlhomilweng tse di itsegeng tsa setipolomate tsa go se gatane menwana ya maoto tse dinaga tsotlhe di itseng gore di tshwanetse go di latela, le yona Amerika, fa go na le sengwe se se ba tshwenyang gore go kgonwe go mekamekanwa le botsalano jwa dinaga ka bobedi.

Kabinete itumedisitswe ke mafoko Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa gore go thankgololwe dipatlisiso tse di sa tseyeng letlhakore go batlisisa mofetsho ono wa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa rekiseditsa naga ya Russia dibetsa.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezaManzi nezokuHlwengisa uNom.
tgt_text: Dintlha tse di ribololwang ke dipatlisiso tseno di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo.

src_text: Senzo Mchunu uzokubonana noMeyara we-Tshwane uKhansela Cilliers Brink ngeLesihlanu womhla wama-26 kuMrhayili wee-2023 emzameni wokutlama ihlelo elihlanganyelweko lokuvuselela i-Rooiwal WWTW, esele kukade seqa isikhathi sokuyivuselela.
tgt_text: Tirisanommogo ya naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Singapore.
Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne amogetse Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi, 16 Motsheganong..

src_text: Eminye imininingwana ungayithola ngokufowunela iZiko leziFo eziThathelwanako (i-NICD) enomborweni yesizo ethi-082 883.
tgt_text: Naga ya Singapore beeletsa tota mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, dipeeletso tsa teng di feta R5 bilione mo maphateng a jaaka la tlhagisodikuno, la ditirelo tsa matlole le la thekiso ya dintlo.

src_text: Iinlimukiso ngokuthi ikholera ilapheka njani ungazithola kubunzinzolwazi i-www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Ditumelano tse di saenilweng magareng ga dinaga ka bobedi maitlhomo tsona ke go gagamatsa tirisanommogo mo mererong ya kgwebisano, dipeeletso, thuto mmogo le ya sesole..
Imbizo ya Moporesitente ya Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo le le Ikaegileng ka Ditikologo (DDM) la Porofense ya Kapa Bophirima.

src_text: Ihlolo Ngabantu Abasebenzako Yaqobe Kota (i-QLFS).
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa garetse Imbizo ya Moporesitente ya borataro ya DDM kwa Porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, kwa Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein, mo Tikologong ya Cape Winelands ka Labotlhano wa la bo 19 Motsheganong..

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhuthazekile ngokuthi i-QLFS yokuthoma yee-2023 itjengise ihlandla lesithandathu ngokulandelana lokukhuphuka ngenani lemisebenzi qobe kota nangokuthi inani labantu abasebenzako abaziingidi ezili-.
tgt_text: Moporesitente ne goga kwa pele baeteledipele botlhe ba maphata otlhe le mararo puso ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go se Nne le Ope yo Tlogelwang kwa Morago”.

src_text: 2 likhakhabela eduze neengidi ezili-.
tgt_text: Morago ga Imbizo Moporesitente ne jela nala lefelo le le gaufi le la Letsholo la Kago ya Mafelo Bodulo la Vlakkeland, mme leno ke la ntlha ka bogolo le le ka ga kago ya dintlo tsa setšhaba go fitlha mo motsing ono mo Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein.

src_text: 4 zabantu ababesebenza ngaphambi kokusahlela kwesifo sengogwana ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Letsholo leno la kago le le simolotseng mo ngwageng wa 2017 tla re fa re garelwa la naya beng ba dintlo tseno ba le 2 556 magae..

src_text: Lesi-ke sitjengiso esikhanyako esifakazela ukuthi umnotho weSewula Afrika uhluma ngobutjha ngamandla ngemva kwalesisifo esikhe sarhagala.
tgt_text: Letsholo la go aga dintlo di le 942 kgato ya lona ya ntlha setse simolotswe, mme dintlo di le 454 di setse di feditswe go agiwa fa di le 301 tsona di santse di agiwa.

Botlhokwa jwa porojeke eno ke go thusa ka ditsela tse di farologaneng tsa kemonokeng ka matlole go thusa ba ba senang letso le bao letseno la bona le fitlhang go R3 500 (ka letsholo la Breaking New Ground), mmogo le go dirisa letsholo la Finance Linked Individual Subsidy go thusa bao ka ngwaga ba iponelang megolo e magareng ga R3 501 le R22.

src_text: Inani labantu abasebenzako ngekota yokuthoma litjengisa ukuthi imisebenzi ezii-209 000 ibe sekorweni ehlelekileko, kwathi imisebenzi eli-107 000 yavuleka ekorweni engakahleleki ngekota yokuthoma yomnyaka.
tgt_text: Mo porojekeng eno go agiwa ka bobedi dintlo tsa setšhaba le tsa Bagale ba Sesole.
Leeto la go Lekola Maemo kwa Masepaleng wa Teropokgolo ya eThekwini le kwa Masepaleng wa Tikologo ya uMgungundlovu ka la bo 18 le la bo 19 Motsheganong.

src_text: Ubudlelwano BeSewula Afrika Ne-United States (i-US).
tgt_text: Jaaka le karolo ya Leeto la go Lekola Maemo go Diragatsa DDM, mo leetong la gagwe la go lekola maemo Motlatsamoporesitente Paul Mashatile ne buisana le bannaleseabe mo maphateng thuto le tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni, temothuo, dikhomese le diintaseteri nngwe ya diporojeke tse di botlhokwa tse di jetsweng nala ke Projeke ya go Fetola Maemo ya Ntshongweni leng teng koo go agiwang Teropo e tla Dirisang Thekenoloji magareng ga Durban lePietermaritzburg.

src_text: IKhabinethi ifakazile ukuthi nangambala ubudlelwano beSewula Afrika ne-US busese buhle, buqinile, begodu buwahlomulisa womabili amazwe la, ngemva komhlangano hlangana kwakaNgqongqotjhe wezeTjhebiswano lamaZwe ngamaZwe nokuSebenzisana, uDorh.
tgt_text: Porojeke eno tla tsosolosa ikonomi mo lefelong leno, mme tla tsenya letseno ka go tlhagisa dipeeletso tse di ka fitlhang go R15 bilione mo dingwageng tse di tlang tse di ka fitlhang magareng ga di le 10 go fitlha go di le.

src_text: Naledi Pandor noMzenda we-US eSewula Afrika uNom.
tgt_text: Mafaratlhatlha Metsi.

src_text: Reuben
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne jetse nala Porojeke ya Metsi a Tshologang kwa Dithabeng tsa Lesotho ka Labobedi wa la bo 23 Motsheganong 2023 mme ko teng ne tsaya karolo mo letsholong la go thankgolola kgato ya bobedi ya porojeke eno.

src_text: Brigety, ngamagama akhe awakhuluma athi batjho iSewula Afrika ihlomisa i-Russia (ngeenkhali).
tgt_text: Jaaka porojeke eno saenetswe go diragadiwa dingwaga di le dintsi tse di fetileng mmogo le go diegisiwa, mokete ono a bontsha gore jaanong tiro mo letsholong le le botlhokwa leno e leng mabapi le letsholo le legolo la dinaga di le pedi tla diragadiwa.
Porojeke ya Metsi a Tshologang kwa Dithabeng tsa Lesotho botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore porofense ya Gauteng, Foreistata, Mpumalanga, Bokone Bophirima le Kapa Bokone di nne le metsi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuyelele yaqinisa ukuthi iindlela zokusebenzisana ngabosomaqhinga zikhona zisetjenziswa kiwo woke amazwe, hlangana nawo ekubalwa nayo i-US, la kungakhulunyelwa khona imiraro yokulawula ubudlelwano bobubili bamazwe lawa.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso mo mafaratlhatlheng metsi go fetola matshelo maAforika Borwa di tswelela mo go ntshitsweng R14 bilione go neela dimasepala go samagana le matsapa tshalelomorago ya mafaratlhatlhatlha metsi, mme matlole ao tla tswa mo Mading Kago ya Mafaratlhatlha Magolo Metsi (RBIG) mmogo le mo Mading Ditirelo tsa Mafaratlhatlha Metsi (WSIG).
RBIG tla dirisa madi go thusa diporojeke di le 130 mme WSIG yona tla thusa diporojeke di le 400 naga ka bophara.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isimemezelo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sokusungulwa kwephenyo elizijameleko elizakuphenya izwangobatjho ethi iSewula Afrika ihlomisa i-Russia.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e diriwang ke Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe (DWS) mo go lwantshaneng le bonweenwee mo madi ka fitlha go R600 milione buseditsweng lefapha ke ditlamo tse di neng di neelwa dithendara go se mo molaong.

src_text: Imininingwana yephenyweli izakumenyezelwa khona duze nje.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa gape le ke dikgato tsa thibelo le taolo go fedisa tiriso ya madi go sa mo molaong, tshenyo ya madi le tirisobotlhaswa ya madi.
Dikabo tsa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi.

src_text: Ubudlelwano BeSewula Afrika Ne-Singapore.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa neetswe tlotlo ke Setheo sa Lefatshe sa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi (ISSA) ka go abela Kabo ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Kontinente ya Aforika ya Tlotlo ya Tiro e Tswileng Diatla mo go Tlhokomeleng Baagi, mme kabo eno akgola dipeeletso tsa puso mo matshelong bana, segolobogolo mo baneng ba ba tswang kwa malapeng a dikobo dikhutshwane.

src_text: UMengameli Ramaphosa usingethe ivakatjho likaNdunakulu u-Lee Hsien Loong weRiphabhligi ye-Singapore ngeLesibili womhla we-16 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Maemo naga ya Aforika Borwa go tsenela dikabo tseno tse di tlotlegang ne bediwa: “Go atolosa ka iketlo tlhokomelo ya baagi go thusa bana ba ba dikobo dikhutshwane: Mo ntlheng ya go Neela Megolo ya Bana, mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa ”.
Mo dikabong tseno go amogetswe dikopo di le 138 go tswa mo dinageng tsa Aforika tseo leng leloko di feta di le..

src_text: I-Singapore ililizwe eliqakathekileko elisisisa lapha eSewula Afrika, njengoba amasiso wayo adlula imali emabhiliyoni ama-R5 emakorweni anjengewokukhiqiza, zeemali kunye nezokwakhiwa nokuthengiswa kwemakho.
tgt_text: Thuso ya baagi ke ntlha e botlhokwa thata mo letsholong la puso la go fedisa khumanego mme bile gape ntlha eno botlhokwa thata mo go busetseng batho ba borona seriti.

src_text: Iimvumelwano ezitlikitliweko hlangana namazwe amabili la zinqophe ukuqinisa ukusebenzisana kezerhwebo, zamasiso, zefundo nezokuvikela.
tgt_text: Thulaganyo ya tlhokomelo ya baagi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa ke nngwe ya dithulaganyo tse dikgolo mo lefatsheng, mo batho ba ba unngwelwang mo go yona ba fetang ba le dimilione di le.

src_text: Imbizo KaMengameli Ngesibonelo Sokuthuthukiswa kwesiyingi SeTjingalanga Kapa
tgt_text: Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo.

src_text: (i-DDM).
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke gore Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo di ntse di tsamaya ka thelelo.

src_text: UMengameli uRamaphosa ubize iMbizo yesithandathu yobeNgameli nge-DDM eTjingalanga Kapa, kuMasipala we-Drakenstein, esiYingini se-Cape Winelands, ngeLesihlanu womhla we-19 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la dinako tsa Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo tse di saletseng mmogo le dinako tsa dikopano le bobegakgang tse di emang nokeng dipuo tseno:..

Labotlhano wa la bo 26 Motsheganong 2023 ka 13:00, Tona ya Lefapha la Pusoselegae le Merero ya Setso<segment (CoGTA), Mme Thembi Nkadimeng tla tshwara kopano le bobegakgang mabapi le Puo ya Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya CoGTA mme yona tla tlhagisa dikgato tse di tla tsewang tse maitlhomo tsona leng go tokafatsa tiro ya dimasepala...

src_text: UMengameli uthwele ibandla leenthunywa elijamele zontathu iingaba zikarhulumende, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Akungasali Muntu Ngemva.” Ngaphambi kweMbizo, uMengameli ukhe wavakatjhela ihlelo lokwakha izindlu eliseduzapho, i-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development, elilihlelo lokwakhela umphakathi elingelikhulu ukuwadlula woke akhe aba khona kuMasipala weNdawo ye-Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Motsheganong 2023, Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago, Mme Lindiwe Zulu, mmogo le Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago Ditirelo tsa Bosiamisi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa, Rre Ronald Lamola, ba tla tshwara Dipuo tsa bona tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo mme dintlha tsa ona ka ga dikopano le bobegakgang di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo..

tgt_text: Yo ngwaga botlhokwa segolobogolo ka ntlha ya gore ke ngwaga yo go ketekewing segopotso sa bo 60 sa go saeniwa ga lekwalo la ditumelano la Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganeng wa Aforika (OAU) e feleditseng le Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganeng wa Aforika (AU).

tgt_text: Mafelo a Itlhophileng Ikonomi (SEZ) kwa Namakwa.
Kabinete neseditse pula SEZ ya kwa Namakwa e kwa Aggeneys mo porofenseng ya Kapa Bokone.

src_text: ISekela likaMengameli u-Paul Mashatile ukhe wacocisana nabahlanganyeli kezefundo nokuthwasisa, kezokulima, zerhwebo nezamabubulo lokhuya nakasevakatjhweni lokuyokuhlola kwaMasipala weThekwini Methro nakuMasipala wesiYingi weMgungundlovu njengengcenye yamavakatjho wokuhlola ukusebenza kwehlelo le-DDM.
tgt_text: Lefelo leno le neseditswe pula go ya ka Molao wa Mafelo a Itlhophileng Ikonomi wa ngwaga wa 2014 (Molao wa bo 16 wa 2014) mmogo le SEZ eo tshitshintsweng eo leng karolo ya Letsholo la Dipeeletso la Moporesitente.

SEZ ya kwa Namakwa tla letlelela dikgato tsa go bula meepo, go tlhagisa leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, go agiwa ga mafaratlhatlha, motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa mmogo le tlhagiso ya dikuno tsa temothuo.

src_text: Enye yamaphrojekthi aqakathekileko avakatjhelweko kube yiNtshongweni Catalytic Project lapho kwakhiwa khona i-Smart City hlangana kweTheku noMgungundlovu.
tgt_text: Makala ano botlhokwa mo go tlholeng ditiro le mo go godiseng ikonomi ya porofense ya Kapa Bokone le ya naga..

src_text: IPhojekthi le izakuvuselela imisebenzi yomnotho kilendawo, ngaleyindlela kungene imali elinganiselwa kumabhiliyonini ali-R15 ngamasiso, eminyakeni eli-10 ukuya keli-15 ezako.
tgt_text: Go setse go dirilwe maikano dipeeletso feta R29 bilione mo kgatong ya ntlha ya SEZ.
Mo go ona go akarediwa Vedanta Zinc (R16 bilione), Frontier Rare Earth (R13 bilione), Hive Energy (R200 milione) le RRS Trade and Investment (R100 milione)..

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo Wezamanzi
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Kgatiso ya Boraro ya Leano la Naga la Mafaratlhatlha Metsi (NWRS-3) sa Ngwaga wa.

Kabinete neseditse pula NWRS-3 ya 2023 gore tsenngwe tirisong mme leano leno le gokelela batlhankedi ba bagolo botlhe le ditheo tsotlhe tseo di rweleng maikarabelo go tsenya tirong Molao wa Metsi Naga wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 36 wa 1998).

src_text: UMengameli Ramaphosa uvakatjhele ihlelo lokuphakela amanzi i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngeLesibili womhla wama-23 kuMrhayili wee-2023 lapho abe khona nesandla ekambisweni yokuphendulwa kwesoyi yesiGaba 2 salelihlelo.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tsamaisana le tshekatsheko e diriwang morago ga dingwaga tse dingwe le tse dingwe di le tharo ya NWRS-2, mo go nopotsweng dikarolo tse le atlegileng mo go tsona mmogo le dikarolo tse go santseng go na le dikgwetlho mo go tsona..

src_text: Ngemva kobana sekuminyaka satlikitlwa lesisivumelwano salelihlelo nangemva kobana seliriyade kangaka, ikambiso yamva le ibe lithemba lokuliphakamisa iinyawo lelihlelo eliqakathekileko.
tgt_text: NWRS-3 na le dintlha di le tharo tse di botlhokwa leng go dira bonnete jwa gore metsi le kgeleloleswe di tlisa tlhabologo, go fedisa khumanego le go se lekalekane, go nna le seabe mo ikonoming le mo go tlholeng ditiro, mme ka jalo metsi tshwanetswe go tlhokomelwa dirisiwe phepafadiwe laolwe le go elwa tlhoko ka go somarela le ka go abela batho ka go lekana.

src_text: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project iqakathekile ekuqinisekiseni ukutholakala kwamanzi e-Gauteng, eFreyistata, eMpumalanga, eTlhagwini Tjingalanga kunye neTlhagwini Kapa.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tlhagisa ditshitshinyo tse di utlwagalang mo go oketseng tlamelo ya metsi, go foka tiriso ya metsi, go tlhokomela ka tshwanelo metsi le kgeleloleswe, go tsenya tirisong melao ya go laola lephata la metsi le kgeleloleswe, go abela setšhaba metsi gore re fetole batsholateu, go rotloetsa tirisanommogo le ditheo tsa boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le go tlhokomela metsi le kgeleloleswe ka fa tlase ga maemo phetogo ya maemo loapi..
NWRS-3 phasaladitswe mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe www.dws.gov.za..

src_text: Ukusetjenziswa kweensetjenziswa nemithombo yamandla emthangalenisisekelo ukuphakamisa ipilo yamaSewula Afrika kusaragela phambili njengoba abomasipala sebabelwe imali engaphezulu kwamabhiliyoni ali-R14 kobanyana balungise imiraro yokusalela emva komthangalasisekelo, ngesiBonelelo somthangalasisekelo i-Regional Bulk Infrastructure Grant (i-RBIG) nese-Water Services Infrastructure Grant (i-WSIG).
tgt_text: Pegelo e ka ga Dikgato tse Lefapha la Sesole (DoD) le di Tsenyang Tirisong go Samagana le Maitsholo Masole Sesole sa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa (SANDF) a Rometsweng kwa Dinageng tse di Nang le Dikgotlang go Dira Bonnete jwa gore go Rena Kagiso.

src_text: I-RBIG izokusetjenziswa emaphrojekthini ali-130 bese kuthi i-WSIG ihlukaniselwa amaphrojekthi angaphezulu kwama-400 elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo ya dikgatelopele tseo naga ya Aforika Borwa di dirileng mo go tseeleng dikgato maitsholo a mangwe masole SANDF a romilweng go dira bonnete jwa gore go rena kagiso mo mafelong ao ba romilweng mo go ona go ralala le kontinente.

SANDF ke setheo se naga ipelang ka sona ka ntlha ya fa se tsaya karolo mo matsholong go tlisa kagiso mo kontinenteng go dira gore mafelo mo go ona go runtseng ntwa ya matlho mahibidu mo kontinenteng ya Aforika go rene kutlwano le kagiso mo go ona ka go ikamanya le tiro ya Dinagakopano (UN)..

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozile nangokuthi umNyango wezaManzi nezokuHlwengisa (i-DWS) wenza indima ebonakalako ekulwiseni ubukhohlakali, njengoba pheze seyihlanganisa ama-R600 weengidi imali esele ibuyiswe ziinkhampani ezahlomula ngamathenda ayeragwe ngokungasimthetho.
tgt_text: Ka ntlha ya ditatofatso tse di runtseng mo ngwageng wa 2015 tsa gore mangwe masole a rometsweng go thusa ka letsholo la go tlisa kagiso latofadiwa ka mekgwa e tswileng mo taolong ya thobalano, Setlhophatiro sa Ditona se ne sa tlhomiwa mo ngwageng wa 2019 gore se batlisise, mo go DoD, fa dikgetse tseno tsa go robalana le baagi ba dinaga tseo ka go ba solofetsa legodimo le lefatshe le go ba tlhorisa (SEA) le boammaruri..

src_text: IKhabinethi itjhejile nokuthi sekunamagadango abekiweko wokukhandela abekwe mnyango wezamanzi ukuqeda ukusetjenziswa kwemali ngokungakafaneli, nangendlela engabuyiseliko nekudlala ngemali.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditswe ke dikgato tse di setseng di tserwe go samagana le ditiragalo tsa SEA mo matsholong go thusa go tlisa kagiso SANDF.
UN tsaya Aforika Borwa jaaka sekai mme akgotse ka fao naga setseng samagane le matsapa ano go fedisa SEA mo go SANDF.

src_text: ISewula Afrika ithokozwe ngonongorwana orhanyazelako wamazwe ngamazwe
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka Seabe sa Bašwa ya Ngwaga wa.

src_text: wokuvikeleka komphakathi nokusebenza kuhle ngeendaba zomphakathi emazweni we-Afrika emnyakeni wee-2023 – i-International Social Security Association (i-ISSA) Good Practice Award in Social Security for Africa 2023 – othokoza umsebenzi karhulumende wokusiza epilweni yabantwabethu, khulukhulu labo ababuya emakhaya anganalitho nanganabuyo.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Letsholo la Ngwaga wa 2023 la Kgwedi ya Bašwa ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go potlakisa thuso ya bašwa mo mererong ya ikonomi gore re kgone go nna le bokamoso jo bo sa tseweng ke phefo”.

Motlatsamoporesitente Mashatile tla ema ka lefoko Letsatsi leno la Naga mme lona le tla ketekiwa matsatsi le mabedi monongwaga go tloga ka la bo 16 go fitlha ka la bo 17 Seetebosigo 2023 kwa Mangaung Outdoor Sport Centre, Mangaung, Bloemfontein, kwa Porofenseng ya Foreistata.

src_text: ISewula Afrika ingene kilonongorwana orhanyazelako ngesihloko esithi: “Kancanikancani Selula Isandla Sokuvikela Abantwana Abacaphazeka Lula Emphakathini: Indaba YesiBonelelo SabaNtwana, ESewula Afrika.” Babe li-138 abebaphalisana bavela eenjamisweni ezima-48 ezimalunga emazweni we-Afrika angaphezulu kwama-.
tgt_text: Mo matsatsing le mabedi ao, bašwa ba tla neelwa tšhono ya go buisana le Ditona le Batlatsatona mmogo le ba bangwe ba bannaleseabe mo dikatisong tse di farologaneng tsa go itlhamela dikgwebo le go tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni go tswa mo pusong le mo badirisanimmogong ba bangwe mo mererong ya loago..

Kgwedi ya Bašwa tla thankgololwa ka Labone wa la bo 1 Seetebosigo 2023 ke Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente e Rweleng Maikarabelo Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi bong Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma kwa Musiamong wa Hector Pieterson Memorial kwa Soweto..

src_text: Isizo lethu lokwenyula umphakathi liyisika yehlelo likarhulumende lokwethula abantu umtlhago nokubuyisa isithunzi sabantu bekhethu.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go gagamatsa matsapa go netefatsa gore bašwa ba fitlhelela ditšhono tsa go nna le seabe mo ikonoming.

src_text: Ihlelo lokuvikela umphakathi eSewula Afrika libalwa hlangana namahlelo angamakhulu khulu ephasini, njengoba lihlomulisa abantu abangaphezulu kweengidi ezili-18 nje.
tgt_text: Puso, jaaka le yona e thapang batho ka bontsi tsibogetse botlhokwa jwa tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni mmogo le go thapiwa ga bašwa ka go dira gore bašwa ba bantsi ba ba alogileng ba thapiwe mo matsholong go ithutela tiro mo Lephateng la Ditirelo tsa Puso go tla go ithutela tiro teng.

Puso samagane gape le go tsenya tirisong Sekgwama sa Matlole go Thapa Baagi (SEF) mmogo le go tsosolosa Setheo Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa (NYS) mo matsholo ano tla tlholelang bašwa ba le diketekete ditiro mo ikonoming.

src_text: Amavowudi Ngesabelo Seemali
tgt_text: Letsholo la Moporesidente la Kemonokeng ya Bašwa ka Ditiro le setse le atlegile mo go emeng nokeng ditšhono di le milione le halofo ka megolo ya letseno la nakwana, go tsenya tirong batho ba le milione le mongwe, ditšhono di le 250 000 tsa go tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni le mo tirong, ditšhono di le 250 000 tsa go lefelwa mabapi le ditirelo tse di abilweng mmogo le bašwa ba le 500 000 ba ba kgonang go itirela letseno le le tla gogang sebaka.

Jaaka re tsena mo Kgweding eno ya Bašwa, puso gakolola bašwa gore ba ikwadise mo sefalaneng sa SAYouth.mobi jaaka bankane ba bona ba le dimilione di le dine bona ba setse ba ikwadisitse, mme seno ke sefalana se ditiro di phasaladiwang teng.

src_text: Nanti irherho elizako lamaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali nemihlangano yeendaba eliphekelelako:

Kabinete neseditse pula Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Molaotlhomo yo Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa IPID wa 2023 gore romelwe kwa Palamenteng..

src_text: I-NWRS-3 yakhiwe minqopho emithathu yommongondaba ihlelo lamanzi nokuhlwengisa ekumele bona liyisekelele ukwakhiwa nokuthuthukiswa, kuqedwe ubuchaka nokutjhiyana ngendima ngokomnotho, kufakwe isandla sokuhlumisa umnotho nokuvulwa kwemisebenzi, amanzi avikelwe, asetjenziswe, atsengwe ngefanelo, aphathwe abe alawulwe ngendlela ebambelelako nelinganisekileko.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa Molao wa IPID wa ngwaga wa 2011 (Molao wa bo 1 wa2011), mme dira ditshitshinyo tse maitlhomo tsona leng go gagamatsa tiro le go ikemela ga setheo sa IPID leng go tsibogela “Katlholo ya Kgotlatshekelo e ka ga Kgetse ya ga Rre McBride”.

Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di samagana gape le dikarolo tsa Molao wa IPID wa 2011 tseo Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo di supileng gore ga di mo molaong, mme tsona ke tse di neelang Tona ya Mapodisi maatla go emisa Tlhogo ya Setheo mo tirong ya gagwe, go tseela Tlhogo ya Setheo dikgato tsa go mo kgalema morago ga gore mo emise kwa tirong, mmogo le go tebela Tlhogo ya Setheo mo tirong.

src_text: Ihlelweli lenza iimphakamiso ezizwakalako zokwandisa amanzi atholakalako, kuphunguke umthamo wokufuneka kwamanzi, amanzi nokuhlwengisa kuphathwe ngcono, kube nelawulo lekoro yamanzi nokuhlwengisa, amanzi asatjalaliswe ngobutjha ngokulandela ukuhlela ngobutjha, kukhuthazwe ukusebenzisana kwamazwe ngamazwe, kulawulwe zamanzi nezokuhlwengisa ebujameni betlayimethi obutjhugulukatjhugulukako.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore dithulaganyo tsa go thapa Tlhogo ya Setheo nne tse di senang lehunelo mme nne e tseneletseng le e fatololang ka tsenelelo gore maitsholo motlhankedi wa IPID gore go thapiwe yo gagwe leng a siameng.
Molaotlhomo yono tlhagisa gape le dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa Molao yo Mogolo, go dira bonnete jwa gore IPID diragatsa tiro ya yona ka tshwanelo le ka botswapelo.
